verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}As I watch in the deepening darkness Feeling weary and witless and worn I turn to You, Lord, and away from myself Oh, when will my hope be reborn?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I trust You, dear Lord, You are all of my hope To You night and day are both one In the depth of my darkness, You are the light In the height of the day, You’re the Sun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Tired and cold with Your watchers I’m watching Not alone, You are with me, O Lord I’ve Your Name and Your Spirit, Your promises true Oh, why do I fret like I do?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I trust You, dear Lord, You are all of my hope To You night and day are both one In the depth of my darkness, You are the light In the height of the day, You’re the Sun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For the Daystar will rise as was promised And the night always comes before day Then the darkness and whispers, confusion, and chill Will all, like a dream, pass away{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I trust You, dear Lord, You are all of my hope To You night and day are both one In the depth of my darkness, You are the light In the height of the day, You’re the Sun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You will come, and we’ll see You in glory And in glory forever You’ll reign Then the last of sin-sickness will fin’lly be judged No more tears, no more death, no more pain{/lang-eng}

verse.lines: {lang-eng}I trust You, dear Lord, You are all of my hope To You night and day are both one In the depth of my darkness, You are the light In the height of the day, You’re the Sun{/lang-eng}
